message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, but you get a decent share.
I think a 40/60 split is fair considering we have 12 rounds to go.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I think a 70/30 split is more reasonable considering the inflation.
Let's compromise.  I'll increase my offer slightly, but time is running out. We both need to get a fair share before the money loses too much value.
